Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to repealing provisions of the highway law and the transportation corporations law to reduce the cost of expanding broadband access; repealer
Summary: Relates to reducing the cost of expanding broadband access.
LawCode: Rpld ยง10 sub 24-e, Hway L; rpld ยง7, Transp Corps L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 24-e of section 10 of the highway law and section 7 of the transportation corporations law, relating to reducing the cost of expanding broadband access
